attributes.action: Create more activity centres for young people around Ruislip.
attributes.additional_details: I feel that teenagers should be able to have a place that they can go to for free to take part in managed activities outside of school. Having  place like this in Ruislip could bring the community closer together and turn teenagers away from other negative activity they may be taking part in out of school.
attributes.background: I would like the government to fund an activity centre in the local area of Ruislip so that teenagers have access to a place that they can go to take part in physical activity for free outside of education.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Provision of local amenities are a matter for your local authoirity, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local authority directly. Find out how to do this here: https://modgov.hillingdon.gov.uk/mgePetitionListDisplay.aspx?bcr=1
